.. _U75-ht1-E3n4-4:
-----------------------------------------------------------
U75-ht1-E3n4-4
-----------------------------------------------------------

Directory.
=========================================
Data is stored in the following directory:

- `mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4 <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4>`_

Avaiable data.
==========================================

The following data for analysis are aviable:

- Parameter file (original): `main_input.org <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/main_input.org>`_
- Checkpoint data directory: `Checkpoints <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/Checkpoints>`_
- Global averaged data directory: `G_Avgs <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/G_Avgs>`_
- Sphere averaged data directory: `Shell_Avgs <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/Shell_Avgs>`_
- Shell spectrum data directory: `Shell_Spectra <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/Shell_Spectra>`_
- Longitudinal averaged data directory: `AZ_Avgs <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/AZ_Avgs>`_
- Fields on spheres directory: `Shell_Slices <https://incite.geodynamics.org/DATA/mheimpel/Uranus75/E3n4/run4/Shell_Slices>`_

Parameters.
=========================================

The following parameters are used:

.. csv-table::
   :file: param.csv
   :encoding: UTF-8
   :header-rows: 1

Examples of visualized images.
=======================================

.. include:: ./Shell_Slices_caption_Ur_1.rst
